helper module¶

helper.date_string(date)[source]¶
helper.daterange(start_date, end_date)[source]¶
helper.eprint(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
helper.is_number(string)[source]¶
helper.time_string(seconds)[source]¶

Converts a datetime object to a concise string returns a String: ‘X days’ if the number of days is greater than 0 ‘X hours’ if the number of hours is greater than 0 ‘X minutes’ if the number of minutes if greater than 1 ‘Not started’ otherwise
